nodes.text: Dodgeball was a sporting activity sometimes played by students at the Jedi academy on Coruscant. As the name suggested, it involved attempting to dodge a thrown ball. Kitmum, the Wookiee coach for Physical Education, would sometimes lead students in sessions of dodgeball. Roan Novachez would later credit skills in dodgeball with helping him in a food fight. Despite being a new pupil the academy and claiming to have never played before, Lilly proved an apt player of dodgeball.
